summary: On March 18, 2008, the US Climate Change Science Program (CCSP), Western Governors Association (WGA), and Western States Water Council (WSWC) convened a roundtable of water managers and scientists from the western United States. The purpose of the roundtable was for CCSP to hear from a variety of water managers about their interests and activities, informational needs, and expectations for and ideas about future directions for climate research, observations, decision support, and communication as it relates to water management, particularly in the western United States.
title: Water Managers Roundtable, Tuesday, March 18, 2008, NOAA Earth System Research Laboratory
